name: SHOOT THOSE GHOSTS PLUS- THE FULL GAME!
name_original: SHOOT THOSE GHOSTS PLUS- THE FULL GAME!
description:
FULL GAME!

7 modes to play

-Classic Mode - The original game

-Classic Mode + - The original game with plus!

-FPS + - Better Graphics Compared to the Original

-Fight mode- Fight The Mighty AI

-Survival Mode - The ghosts Shoot you! Survive

-Magic mode- The Bullet Always points in your direction, Even when Fired

-Random mode- A lot of Ghosts, Really HARD

Added Music And 3 guns- A Sniper , A double barrel Shotgun and a rocket Launcher.

Enjoy!

And, Download as fast as possible,This is FREE, but may get paid.
